name: Dad's Coming (itch)
description:
Game made in 48 hours during Alberta Game Jam 2020, which theme was "After the Storm". Source code available on GitHub.

You made a big mess in your house and your parents are coming back soon, can you clean up everything in time?

Controls
  • Join Game
    • Keyboard Left: Space
    • Keyboard Right: Enter
    • Controller: Start / Options
  • Move / Aim
    • Keyboard Left: WASD
    • Keyboard Right: Arrows
    • Controller: Left Stick
  • Jump
    • Keyboard Left: Space
    • Keyboard Right: P
    • Controller: A / X
  • Throw / pick up object
    • Keyboard Left: Left Shift
    • Keyboard Right: O
    • Controller: RB / R1
  • Drop / pick up  object
    • Keyboard Left: Left Control
    • Keyboard Right: I
    • Controller: X / Square
  • Change Character (single player only)
    • Keyboard Left: Q or E
    • Keyboard Right: K or L
    • Controller: LB / L1
Credits
  • Abner Santos (Programming and UI Art)
  • Henrique Camillo (Programming)
  • Satoshi (Art)
